dict.string: Chronicle monitors system activity to provide comprehensive system tracking and search capabilities.
Chronicle requires input monitoring permission to track keyboard and mouse activity for system monitoring.
Chronicle requires screen capture permission to monitor screen activity and content changes.
Chronicle requires accessibility permission to monitor window and application activity.
Chronicle requires full disk access to monitor file system changes and provide complete system tracking.
Chronicle requires microphone permission to monitor audio input activity.
Chronicle requires camera permission to monitor camera activity.
Chronicle requires network access to monitor network activity and communicate with services.
